property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
property.description: The amount of memory the MR AppMaster needs.

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each reduce task.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.env
property.description: User added environment variables for the MR App Master processes, specified as a comma separated list.

property.name: mapreduce.map.env
property.description: User added environment variables for map, specified as a comma separated list.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.env
property.description: User added environment variables for reduce, specified as a comma separated list.
